item.description:
Join us for a hike through the less-frequented eastern half of the Blue Hills for some friendly conversation and starkly beautiful scenery. We will be leaving from the Shea Ice Rink parking lot at 651 Willard Street in Quincy at 9:00am on Saturday, November 21st. This will be a relatively long hike winding through five miles of rocky trails. Good boots and warm layers are required. Please pack a lunch and plenty of water as the hike will take 5+ hours with plenty of stops to enjoy the views.

This is co-listed with the boston AMC young members so it is ideal for those who are under 40 or just young at heart.
item.name: A walk in the woods - young members
